org.forgerock.openidm.repo.jdbc.impl

Class JDBCRepoService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.repo.jdbc.impl.JDBCRepoService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, org.forgerock.openidm.repo.RepoBootService, org.forgerock.openidm.repo.RepositoryService

    @Service
@Properties(value={@Property(name="service.description",value="Repository Service using JDBC"),@Property(name="service.vendor",value="ForgeRock AS."),@Property(name="openidm.router.prefix",value="/repo/*"),@Property(name="db.type",value="JDBC")})
public class JDBCRepoService
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, org.forgerock.openidm.repo.RepoBootService, org.forgerock.openidm.repo.RepositoryService
    Repository service implementation using JDBC
